text: The Lophophorata are a Lophotrochozoan clade consisting of the Brachiozoa and the Bryozoa. (1972). The Lophophorate Coelomates. in: Invertebrate Zoology 2nd ed. 671–697 They have a lophophore. On morphological grounds they used to be assessed as deuterostomes. ==References==
title: Lophophorata
